options: ['Alice is busy now', "Alice doesn't like raining", 'Alice is going to the park', 'Alice is happy now']
article:
Alice is a busy girl. Now she is relaxing .She is watching the Friday night weather report on television .She likes sunny weather just like today. She wants to know what the weather will be like tomorrow.
She's going to have a picnic  .This is what the reporter is saying, "Good evening and welcome to evening weather report. We are going to have a very different weather across the country..."Alice is sad .She doesn't like raining.
